column2: but my favorite ramen place in Houston! I have tried many other ramen places but Jinya is still the best. The broth was very flavorful
column3: but I wish they cut down the salt a little bit. It gets salty as I finish half way. Another highlight is that they have both thick and thin noodles for you to choose. Most other places only have thin noodles
column4: but I prefer thick noodles which are chewier similar to udon texture. The portion is big
column5: I can never finish the whole bowl.
